    A

    add(Shape) - Method in class Canvas
    Adds the given Shape to the Canvas.

    C

    Canvas - Class in Unnamed Package
    Object representing the Canvas which contains Shapes are drawn on.
    Canvas() - Constructor for class Canvas
    Constructs default canvas with no Shapes contained within.
    Circle - Class in Unnamed Package
    Concrete definition of a circle defined using the inherited properties of Ellipse.
    Circle(double, Point, Color, boolean) - Constructor for class Circle
    Constructs a circle with given radius, position, Color, and isFilled property.
    clear() - Method in class Canvas
    Clear the canvas of all shapes by re-creating a new and empty ArrayList<Shape>.
    compareTo(Shape) - Method in class Shape
    Compares two shapes first (1) lexicographically and then (2) by their area.
    ConvexPolygon - Class in Unnamed Package
    Concrete definition of a convex polygon defined by (in addition to the inherited properties from Shape): vertices encoded as an array of Points (which gets set at object instantiation and can be mutated but is never destroyed).
    ConvexPolygon(Point[], Color, boolean) - Constructor for class ConvexPolygon
    Constructs a convex polygon with given array of vertices, Color, and isFilled property.

    E

    Ellipse - Class in Unnamed Package
    Concrete definition of an ellipse defined by (in addition to the inherited properties from Shape): a semi-major and semi-minor axis (or radii), which are both of type double.
    Ellipse(double, double, Point, Color, boolean) - Constructor for class Ellipse
    Constructs a rectangle with the given width, height, position, color, and isFilled properties.
    equals(Object) - Method in class ConvexPolygon
    Overrides Object.equals(Object) method so that it returns true for two ConvexPolygon objects that are logically equivalent based on the state of all of their instance variables.
    equals(Object) - Method in class Ellipse
    Overrides Object.equals(Object) method so that it returns true for two Ellipse objects that are logically equivalent based on the state of all of their instance variables.
    equals(Object) - Method in class Shape
    Compares this Shape to the specified object.

    setHeight(int) - Method in class Square
    Overrides inherited setHeight method from class Rectangle; sets both height and width to given height to maintain square property.
    setPosition(Point) - Method in class ConvexPolygon
     
    setPosition(Point) - Method in class Ellipse
     
    setPosition(Point) - Method in class Shape
    Sets position of this Shape using the components specified in the Point.
    setRadius(double) - Method in class Circle
    Sets the radius of this Circle object.
    setSemiMajorAxis(double) - Method in class Circle
    Overrides inherited Ellipse.setSemiMajorAxis(double), setting both semi-major axis and semi-minor axis of this Circle object to the quantity given via radius.
    setSemiMajorAxis(double) - Method in class Ellipse
    Sets the semi-major axis of this Ellipse object, swapping the major and minor axis if the new quantity given for the semi-major axis ends up being smaller than the existing semi-minor axis.
    setSemiMinorAxis(double) - Method in class Circle
    Overrides inherited Ellipse.setSemiMinorAxis(double), setting both semi-major axis and semi-minor axis of this Circle object to the quantity given via radius.
    setSemiMinorAxis(double) - Method in class Ellipse
    Sets the semi-minor axis of this Ellipse object, swapping the minor and major axis if the new quantity given for the semi-minor axis ends up being larger than the existing semi-major axis.
    setSize(int) - Method in class Square
    Changes the side length of the square to the specified size.
    setVertex(int, Point) - Method in class ConvexPolygon
    Sets vertex at the given index to the components of the Point.
    setVertex(int, Point) - Method in class Rectangle
    Overrides ConvexPolygon.setVertex(int, Point) and throws UnsupportedOperationException.
    setVertexA(Point) - Method in class Triangle
    Sets the vertex a Point of this Triangle object.
    setVertexB(Point) - Method in class Triangle

    Sets the width of this Rectangle object.
    setWidth(int) - Method in class Square
    Overrides inherited Rectangle.setWidth(int), setting both width and height of this Square to given width to maintain square property.
    Shape - Class in Unnamed Package
    Abstract definition of a shape, which has a Color attribute and a boolean attribute for indicating whether ths shape is filled (true) or wireframed (false).
    Shape(Color, Boolean) - Constructor for class Shape
    Abstract constructor for Shape objects; constructs Color and isFilled property.
    size() - Method in class Canvas
    Returns the number of Shapes currently contained in this Canvas object.
    Square - Class in Unnamed Package
    Concrete definition of a rectangle defined using the inherited properties of Rectangle.
    Square(int, Point, Color, boolean) - Constructor for class Square
    Constructs a square with given side length, position, color, and filled property.

    T

    Triangle - Class in Unnamed Package
    Concrete definition of a triangle defined by the inherited properties from ConvexPolygon.
    Triangle(Point, Point, Point, Color, boolean) - Constructor for class Triangle
    Constructs a triangle with given vertices a, b, c, color, and isFilled properties.
